p: Stereological methods were used to investigate the effects of O. persica extract on pancreatic β-cells in streptozocin diabetic rats. The study found a significant reduction in pancreatic weight and volume, and pancreatic islet volume, in diabetic and extract-treated groups, although these reductions were significantly less significant in treated groups, indicating the ability of the plant to prevent the remaining β-cells in the pancreatic islets from undergoing some pathologic changes, such as hypertrophy [ 236, 237].
